MA in Typeface Design — University of Reading

MA in Typeface Design with Distinction, University of Reading, UK (2016).

Year 2016
Context Academic
Status Completed

Received an MA in Typeface Design with Distinction from the Department of Typography & Graphic Communication at the University of Reading, UK, in 2016. The programme is internationally regarded as one of the foremost postgraduate degrees in type design.
